attributes.action: Pressure the Canadian PrimeMinister to STOP THE SEAL CULL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an outrageous cruel and sadistic sport which should have been wiped out decades ago.  The British government should put immediate pressue on Canada to stop this criminal barbarity IMMEDIATELY and make sure heavy sanctions and international penalties are imposed should they not stop.  This planet has enough wanton cruelty wreaking havoc amongst cruel sadistic people already.  Lets put a stop to primitive ways and move on to a future where we can leave a planet filled with life for our children not death and destruction.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
